cgcloud__Order_Item_Inventory_Transactio.name: cgcloud__Order_Item_Inventory_Transaction__c
cgcloud__Order_Item_Inventory_Transactio.description: Holds the association details for the order item template, the inventory control template, and the inventory transaction template.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Attribute used to enable or disable the current template or record.

cgcloud__Inventory_Control_Template__c.description: Reference to the Inventory control template ID.

cgcloud__Inventory_Transaction_Template_.description: Reference to the Inventory transaction template ID.

cgcloud__Order_Item_Template__c.description: Reference to the Order item template ID.

cgcloud__Unique_Field_Display__c.description: Technical field to verify that only one active record is used for display as Yes. Consists of: Order_Item_Template.Id Active (True, False) User_For_Display (True, False)

cgcloud__Unique_Inventory_Templates__c.description: Technical field to verify the uniqueness for the combination of order template, inventory control template, and inventory transaction template. Inventory_Control_Template.Id Inventory_Transaction_Template.Id

cgcloud__Used_For_Display__c.description: Specifies the inventory template that's relevant for showing the current inventory balances in the disposal list.
